name: Cannot update the name of project with different characters in name -- @1.5

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "This extended_string is too long:  'This is an example of a name of project in pivotal.'"

parameters.name: name
parameters.value: "This is an example of a name of project in pivotal."

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: This extended_string is too long:  'This is an example of a name of project in pivotal.'

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
